name: Street Chess
description:
Your brother has gone missing after discovering a new form of illegal Chess. To find out what happened to your brother you must enter the murky underworld of Street Chess. Battle ever increasingly skilled opponents on your quest for the truth.

What is street Chess?
Street Chess follows all the standard rules of Chess with one big change. You can make any legal move at any time with no need to wait for your opponent to make a move. You can even make multiple moves together. In fact make as many moves at once as you have fingers. Hell, get a friend to help and move all 18 pieces at once. It's your choice.
